description.plain: MacArthur Johnson, better known as FunnyMike or 22 Savage, is a American comedian and rapper best known for his videos on social media platforms such as Instagram and YouTube. He is also known for his singles such as “Hit That Bit For the Gram”, “Ain’t No 21”, and “Black Opps”. As of Season 11, he is one of the recurring cast members of the improv comedy show Wild ‘N Out on MTV.

body.plain: MacArthur Johnson, better known as FunnyMike or 22 Savage, is a American comedian and rapper best known for his videos on social media platforms such as Instagram and YouTube. He is also known for his singles such as “Hit That Bit For the Gram”, “Ain’t No 21”, and “Black Opps”. As of Season 11, he is one of the recurring cast members of the improv comedy show Wild ‘N Out on MTV.

songs.title: Ain’t No 21

description.plain: “Ain’t no 21” was made by rapper 22 Savage to say that he isn’t 21 Savage and you shouldn’t mix them up. It was released on WorldStarHipHop on December 20, 2016, and has created a series of rappers with the name “Savage” in them. Some include 23 Savage, 24 Savage, and 33 Savage.

songs.embed_content: Read “Ain't No 21” by FunnyMike on Genius

body.plain: “Ain’t no 21” was made by rapper 22 Savage to say that he isn’t 21 Savage and you shouldn’t mix them up. It was released on WorldStarHipHop on December 20, 2016, and has created a series of rappers with the name “Savage” in them. Some include 23 Savage, 24 Savage, and 33 Savage.

songs.title: Jumpin

description.plain: 21 Savage impersonator, 22 Savage, drops the first single for his new mixtape, Savage Mode.

songs.embed_content: Read “Jumpin” by FunnyMike on Genius

body.plain: 21 Savage impersonator, 22 Savage, drops the first single for his new mixtape, Savage Mode.
